member.name: T:ICCPExport.FileExporter
member.summary: Represents an action adapter that exports measurements on an interval to a file that can be picked up by other systems such as ICCP.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.ExportInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in seconds, at which data will be queued for concentration and then exported.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.UseReferenceAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a reference angle is used to adjust the value of phase angles.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.ReferenceAngleMeasurement
member.summary: Gets or sets the key of the measurement used to adjust the value of phase angles.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.CompanyTagPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix attached to the beginning of the measurements' point tags, excluding the underscore.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.UseNumericQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether the measurement quality is represented as a numeric value rather than a symbolic value.

member.name: P:ICCPExport.FileExporter.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the .

member.name: M:ICCPExport.FileExporter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:ICCPExport.FileExporter.PublishFrame(GSF.TimeSeries.IFrame,System.Int32)
member.summary: Process frame of time-aligned measurements that arrived within the defined lag time.
member.param: of measurements that arrived within lag time and are ready for processing.
Index of within one second of data ranging from zero to frames per second - 1.
